title: The Shifter Dimension
description: An inescapable conflict. A weapon with devastating capabilities.Lock has a choice – stay at home and develop a team of enhanced-ability operatives like himself, or help his fellow fighters as they face the greatest threat they have ever seen. He opts to save his colleagues, but events take an unexpected turn and the danger of the battlefield is soon felt closer to home.Aided by SAS trooper Jimmy Mackenzie, and MI6 officer Steven Stringer, Lock fights to stay one step ahead of the enemies who want to put them all out of action.The Shifter Dimension is the second book in J M Johnson’s Starbirth series: fantasy adventures set within a contemporary military basis.
author: J.M. Johnson
